name: Snake-like
description:
School project.

Made to show how I use the concept of game stages (early, mid and late game) in playtesting to improve a game experience. 

Testers were told to play the original version of Snake, then comment on where they think the game transitions from early to mid and late game stages. They were then asked to identify when they thought the game was the most fun. 

This version is the result of that data.

The game plays exclusively on Android phones, and since I made it for a presentation, not release, it's optimized for my phone, a Samsung Galaxy s10.
